text: Lauro Fred Cavazos Jr. (January 4, 1927 - March 15, 2022) was an American politician. He served as Secretary of Education from 1988 to 1990. He was the first Hispanic to serve in the United States Cabinet. Cavazos was born in Kingsville, Texas. He was of Mexican descent. Cavazos died on March 15, 2022 in Concord, Massachusetts at the age of 95. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:United States Secretaries of Education Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Texas
